statements: UPDATE toll_collection SET toll_amount = 10.50, collection_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;
UPDATE toll_collection SET collection_date = '2021-09-20', toll_amount = 15.75 WHERE vehicle_id = 5678;
UPDATE toll_collection SET toll_amount = 10.5, collection_date = '2021-08-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 12345
UPDATE toll_collection SET collection_date = '2021-08-20', toll_amount = 15.75 WHERE vehicle_id = 54321
UPDATE toll_collection SET collected_amount = 25.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE revenue_generation SET total_revenue = 15000.25, generation_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE revenue_id = 2001;
UPDATE toll_collection SET collected_amount = collected_amount + 10.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE revenue_generation SET total_revenue = total_revenue * 1.1, generation_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE toll_plaza_id = 2001;
UPDATE toll_booths SET location = 'Highway 1, Exit 5' WHERE booth_id = 1;
UPDATE toll_transactions SET amount = 7.50, vehicle_number = 'ABC123' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE toll_booths SET location = 'New Location', booth_name = 'Updated Booth Name' WHERE booth_id = 1

UPDATE toll_booths SET toll_amount = 5.00 WHERE booth_id = 1;
UPDATE vehicles SET owner_name = 'John Doe', registration_number = 'ABC123' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE toll_transactions SET transaction_amount = 15.75, transaction_time = '2022-07-31 12:45:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE vehicles SET owner_name = 'John Doe', vehicle_type = 'SUV' WHERE vehicle_id = 2002;
UPDATE toll_booths SET is_active = true WHERE booth_id = 1;
UPDATE vehicles SET make = 'Toyota', year = 2020 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE toll_booths SET type = 'Express' WHERE location = 'Main Street';
